name: Pigtober [Devtober 2020]
description:
This is a game made for Devtober 2020. The goal is to get as far as you can while destroying the Pumpkins! There may be some issues and the game was not balanced too much but players can still get far. I just wanted to test out an idea to see how it would turn out.

Controls:

W - Move Forward

A - Move Left

D - Move Right

SPACE - Shoot Weapon
